sqlMap.select: select l.portlet_tp, l.portlet_nm, l.width, p.portal_id, s.position, s.portlet_key, case when l.resize_yn = 'Y' and IFNULL(s.abjust_height,0) != 0 then s.abjust_height else l.height end as height, s.position, l.iframe_yn, case l.iframe_yn when 'Y' then (case when l.portlet_tp in ('top_ea','cn_ea','top_ea_ea','cn_ea_ea') then concat(l.iframe_url,'portletTp=',l.portlet_tp) else l.iframe_url end) when 'I' then s.if_url else '' end as if_url, l.iframe_error_url, case when l.iframe_yn = 'P' then ifnull((SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(file_id,'|',link_url,'|',case when ss.link_id is null then 'N' else 'Y' end,'|',case when ss.sso_type is null then '' else ss.sso_type end,'|',case when ss.link_id is null then '' else ss.link_id end,'|',case when ss.link_tp is null then '' else ss.link_tp end,'|',case when ss.link_seq is null then '' else ss.link_seq end) separator 'â–¦') FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_portlet_link A left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_sso ss ON A.link_id = ss.link_id and A.link_seq = ss.link_seq where DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') between show_from and (case when ifnull(show_to,'') = '' then '9999-99-99' else show_to end) and use_yn='Y' and a.link_id=s.link_id),'') else '' end as link_list, concat('/gw/Images/portal/',l.portlet_tp,'.png') as img_url, case when u.custom_value0 is null then ifnull(s.val0,'') else u.custom_value0 end as val0, ifnull(s.val1,'') as val1, ifnull(s.val2,'') as val2, ifnull(s.val3,'') as val3, ifnull(s.val4,'') as val4, s.sort as sort, ifnull(s.portlet_nm_kr, l.portlet_nm) as portlet_nm_kr, case when s.portlet_nm_en is null then l.portlet_nm_en else s.portlet_nm_en end as portlet_nm_en, case when s.portlet_nm_cn is null then l.portlet_nm_cn else s.portlet_nm_cn end as portlet_nm_cn, case when s.portlet_nm_jp is null then l.portlet_nm_jp else s.portlet_nm_jp end as portlet_nm_jp, ifnull(if_sso.sso_type,'') as if_sso, ifnull(if_sso.link_id,'') as link_id from $DB_NEOS$t_co_portal p join $DB_NEOS$t_co_portlet_set s on p.portal_id = s.portal_id join $DB_NEOS$t_co_portlet l on s.portlet_tp = l.portlet_tp left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_sso if_sso on if_sso.link_seq = -1 and if_sso.link_id = s.link_id and if_sso.link_tp = s.portlet_tp left outer join $DB_NEOS$t_co_portlet_user_set u on p.portal_id = u.portal_id and l.portlet_tp = u.portlet_tp and u.emp_seq = #empSeq# and u.comp_seq = #compSeq# where s.use_yn = 'Y' and p.portal_id = (select portal_id from $DB_NEOS$t_co_portal where use_yn='Y' order by (case when comp_seq=#compSeq# then 0 else portal_id end) limit 1) order by s.sort

select lnb_menu_gubun as lnbMenuGubun, gnb_menu_no as gnbMenuNo, $DB_NEOS$FN_GetMultiLang(#langCode#,gnb.menu_nm_multi) as gnbMenuNm, lnb_menu_no as lnbMenuNo, $DB_NEOS$FN_GetMultiLang(#langCode#,lnb.menu_nm_multi) as lnbMenuNm from $DB_NEOS$t_co_main_portlet p left join $DB_NEOS$v_t_co_menu_multi gnb on p.gnb_menu_no=gnb.menu_no left join $DB_NEOS$v_t_co_menu_multi lnb on p.lnb_menu_no=lnb.menu_no where portlet_type=#portletType# and (comp_seq=0 or comp_seq=#compSeq#) order by comp_seq desc limit 1

SELECT RESULT.alert_seq, RESULT.event_type as module_type, RESULT.event_sub_type as alert_type, RESULT.seq, RESULT.sub_seq, RESULT.url_path, RESULT.alert_contents, RESULT.alert_title, RESULT.lnb_menu_no, RESULT.read_date, $DB_NEOS$get_menu_first_info('0', RESULT.lnb_menu_no, #langCode#) AS gnb_menu_no, $DB_NEOS$get_menu_first_info('1', RESULT.lnb_menu_no, #langCode#) AS gnb_menu_nm, $DB_NEOS$get_menu_info('3', RESULT.lnb_menu_no, #langCode#) AS url_gubun, $DB_NEOS$get_menu_info('2', RESULT.lnb_menu_no, #langCode#) AS menu_gubun, convert(date_format(RESULT.create_date, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i'), char(30)) as create_date, RESULT.data as jsonData, RESULT.lang_code, case when DATE_ADD(RESULT.create_date, INTERVAL +12 HOUR) > now() then 'Y' else 'N' end as newYN
FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.alert_seq, a.event_type, a.event_sub_type, a.seq, a.sub_seq, a.url_path, a.alert_contents, a.alert_title, c.lnb_menu_no, b.read_date, a.create_date, a.data, a.lang_code FROM $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert` a, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert_receiver` b, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert_menu` c WHERE a.alert_seq = b.alert_seq -- and b.read_date is null and a.event_sub_type = c.event_sub_type and b.emp_seq = #empSeq# and b.comp_seq = #compSeq# and a.lang_code = #langCode# ORDER BY CASE WHEN b.read_date IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END , a.create_date desc LIMIT 0, 50 ) RESULT ORDER BY CASE WHEN RESULT.read_date IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END , RESULT.create_date desc

SELECT count(*) as alert_cnt FROM $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert_receiver` b WHERE b.emp_seq = #empSeq# and b.comp_seq = #compSeq# and b.read_date is null AND exists (SELECT 1 FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_alert a where a.alert_seq = b.alert_seq)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert_receiver` SET `read_date` = NOW() WHERE `alert_seq` = #alertSeq# AND `group_seq` = #groupSeq# AND `comp_seq` = #compSeq# AND `emp_seq` = #empSeq#
sqlMap.select:
/* MainManageDAO.selectAdminAuthCnt - mariadb */
select count(*) as cnt from $DB_NEOS$t_co_authcode A INNER JOIN $DB_NEOS$t_co_auth_relate B ON A.author_code = B.author_code where A.comp_seq = #compSeq# and B.comp_seq = #compSeq# and B.emp_seq = #empSeq# and B.dept_seq in (select dept_Seq from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_dept where emp_Seq = #empSeq#) and A.author_use_yn = 'Y' and A.author_type = '005'
/* MainManageDAO.selectMasterAuthCnt - mariadb */ select count(*) as cnt from $DB_NEOS$`t_co_emp_option` A where A.emp_seq = #empSeq# and A.master_use_yn = 'Y'

select ec.group_seq, ec.comp_seq, ec.emp_seq from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on e.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq where ec.work_status in ('999','004') and ec.use_yn='Y'
and ec.erp_emp_seq = #ssoToken#
and e.login_id = #ssoToken#
order by (case when e.main_comp_seq=ec.comp_seq then 0 else 1 end), ec.comp_seq limit 1
sqlMap.delete: delete from $DB_NEOS$t_co_alert_receiver where alert_seq = #alertSeq# and group_seq = #groupSeq# and comp_seq = #compSeq# and emp_seq = #empSeq#
sqlMap.update: update $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert` a, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert_receiver` b set b.read_date = now() WHERE a.alert_seq = b.alert_seq and b.emp_seq = #empSeq# and b.comp_seq = #compSeq# and b.read_date is null
sqlMap.select: SELECT comp_seq FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp WHERE email_domain = #emailDomain#
select email_domain from $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp where comp_seq = #compSeq#
sqlMap.update: update $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert` a, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert_receiver` b set b.read_date = now() WHERE a.alert_seq = b.alert_seq and b.emp_seq = #empSeq# and b.comp_seq in($sCompSeq$) and b.read_date is null and b.event_type = 'MAIL'
sqlMap.select: SELECT IFNULL((SELECT alram_cnt FROM $DB_NEOS$t_eap_box_emp_count WHERE group_seq = #groupSeq# AND comp_seq = #compSeq# AND emp_seq = #empSeq# and ea_box_id = '0' and box_code = '20' limit 1),0) eapproval, IFNULL((SELECT alram_cnt FROM $DB_NEOS$t_eap_box_emp_count WHERE group_seq = #groupSeq# AND comp_seq = #compSeq# AND emp_seq = #empSeq# and ea_box_id = '0' and box_code = '60' limit 1) ,0) eapprovalRef

select count(*) as cnt from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on e.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq and ec.work_status='999' and ec.use_yn='Y' join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on ec.comp_seq = c.comp_seq and c.use_yn='Y' join $DB_NEOS$teag_appdoc ad on ec.comp_seq = ad.co_id and ec.emp_seq = ad.user_id and ad.doc_sts in ('20','30') join $DB_NEOS$teag_form form on ad.form_id = form.form_id and ifnull(form.use_yn,'1') = '1' where e.emp_seq = #empSeq#
SELECT * FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_event_count WHERE group_seq = #groupSeq# AND emp_seq = #empSeq# LIMIT 1

select *from $DB_EDMS$board_art where cat_seq_no = '3083' order by write_date desc
limit 10
limit #NumItems#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_menu_history SET emp_seq = #empSeq#, use_date = sysdate(), access_ip = #accessIp#, menu_no = #menuNo#, menu_nm = #menuNm#, menu_auth = #menuAuth# ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE emp_seq = #empSeq#, use_date = sysdate(), access_ip = #accessIp#, menu_no = #menuNo#, menu_nm = #menuNm#, menu_auth = #menuAuth#
sqlMap.select: SELECT login_id FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp where ls_role_id = #key#

select d.path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept d join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on d.dept_seq = ec.dept_seq and ec.work_status='999' and ec.use_yn = 'Y' where ec.emp_seq=#empSeq# and ec.dept_seq=#deptSeq# and ec.comp_seq=#compSeq#
select ifnull(comp_mail_url,(select mail_url from $DB_NEOS$t_co_group where group_seq=#groupSeq#)) as "sreturn" from $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp where comp_seq=#compSeq# limit 1
select art_seq_no ,org_file_name ,tmp_file_name from $DB_EDMS$board_attach_file where file_seq_no=#fileId# limit 1

select l.portlet_tp, l.portlet_nm, l.width, case when l.resize_yn = 'Y' and IFNULL(s.abjust_height,0) != 0 then s.abjust_height else l.height end as height, s.position, l.iframe_yn, case l.iframe_yn when 'Y' then (case when l.portlet_tp in ('top_ea','cn_ea','top_ea_ea','cn_ea_ea') then concat(l.iframe_url,'?portletTp=',l.portlet_tp) else l.iframe_url end) when 'I' then s.if_url else '' end as if_url, l.iframe_error_url, case when l.iframe_yn = 'P' then ifnull((SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(file_id,'|',link_url,'|',case when ss.link_id is null then 'N' else 'Y' end,'|',case when ss.sso_type is null then '' else ss.sso_type end,'|',case when ss.link_id is null then '' else ss.link_id end,'|',case when ss.link_tp is null then '' else ss.link_tp end,'|',case when ss.link_seq is null then '' else ss.link_seq end) separator 'â–¦') FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_portlet_link A left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_sso ss ON A.link_id = ss.link_id and A.link_seq = ss.link_seq where DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') between show_from and (case when ifnull(show_to,'') = '' then '9999-99-99' else show_to end) and use_yn='Y' and a.link_id=s.link_id),'') else '' end as link_list, concat('/gw/Images/portal/',l.portlet_tp,'.png') as img_url, ifnull(s.val0,'') as val0, ifnull(s.val1,'') as val1, ifnull(s.val2,'') as val2, ifnull(s.val3,'') as val3, ifnull(s.val4,'') as val4 from $DB_NEOS$t_co_portal p join $DB_NEOS$t_co_portlet_set s on p.portal_id = s.portal_id join $DB_NEOS$t_co_portlet l on s.portlet_tp = l.portlet_tp where s.portlet_tp = 'lr_user' AND s.use_yn = 'Y' and p.portal_id = (select portal_id from $DB_NEOS$t_co_portal where use_yn='Y' order by (case when comp_seq=#compSeq# then 0 else portal_id end) limit 1) order by s.sort limit 1

SELECT menu_no FROM ( SELECT distinct cma.menu_no FROM ( SELECT distinct car.author_code FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_auth_relate car JOIN $DB_NEOS$t_co_authcode a ON car.author_code = a.author_code AND car.author_type = a.author_type AND a.author_use_yn = 'Y' WHERE (car.author_type = '001' and car.comp_seq=#compSeq# and car.emp_seq=#empSeq#) or (car.author_type = '002' and car.dept_seq=#deptSeq#) ) a2_ahtu JOIN $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu_auth cma ON a2_ahtu.author_code = cma.author_code JOIN $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu cm ON cma.menu_no = cm.menu_no and cm.use_yn = 'Y' and IFNULL(cm.delete_yn,'N') = 'N' ) a3_menu WHERE a3_menu.menu_no IN (100000000,600000000, 500000000, 400000000, 300000000, 303010000, 304000000, 2000000000, 200000000, 1)
select * from $DB_NEOS$t_msg_tcmh_link where token=#ssoToken#
select * from $DB_NEOS$t_msg_tcmh_link where token = #ssoToken# and TimeStampDiff(minute, create_date, now()) < 5
select link_seq from $DB_NEOS$t_msg_tcmh_link where token = #ssoToken#

isNotEmpty.isEqual:
select #sRet# as ret, a.group_seq, a.comp_seq, a.emp_seq, a.link_seq, a.link_type, a.event_type, a.event_sub_type, a.login_ip, case when b.msg_target = 'mail' then (select url_path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu d where d.menu_no = b.menu_no) when b.msg_target = 'eap' then concat((select url_path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu c where c.menu_no = b.menu_no),'?menu_no=',b.menu_no) when b.msg_target = 'project' and a.seq is not null then concat('/Views/Common/project/projectView.do?pSeq=', a.seq) else a.url_path end as url_path,
case when b.msg_target = 'project' and a.seq is not null then '401010000' else b.menu_no end as menu_no, case when b.msg_target = 'project' and a.seq is not null then '400000000' else b.gnb_menu_no end as gnb_menu_no, case when b.msg_target = 'project' and a.seq is not null then '401010000' else b.lnb_menu_no end as lnb_menu_no, case b.menu_no when 0 then b.link_nm_kr else $DB_NEOS$get_menu_first_info('1', b.menu_no, d.native_lang_Code) end as link_nm_kr, b.link_nm_en, b.link_nm_jp, b.link_nm_cn, b.link_kind, b.msg_target, b.target_url, b.link_param, c.encrypt_type, 'B' as messenger_view_type, case when a.event_type = 'PROJECT' then 'project' when a.event_type = 'MAIL' then 'mail2' when a.event_type = 'REPORT' then 'schedule' when a.event_type = 'EAPPROVAL' then 'eapproval' when a.event_type = 'SCHEDULE' then 'schedule' when a.event_type = 'BOARD' then 'edms' when a.event_type = 'EDMS' then 'edms' else '' end as moduleTp from $DB_NEOS$`t_msg_tcmh_link` a, $DB_NEOS$`t_msg_tcmg_link` b, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_encrypt` c, $DB_NEOS$`t_Co_emp` d where a.link_seq = b.link_seq and a.token = #ssoToken# and b.encrypt_seq = c.encrypt_seq and a.emp_seq = d.emp_seq limit 1

isEqual.isNotEmpty: SELECT #sRet# AS ret, a.group_seq, a.comp_seq, a.emp_seq, a.link_seq, a.link_type, a.event_type, a.event_sub_type, CASE b.msg_target WHEN 'mail' THEN (SELECT url_path FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu d WHERE d.menu_no = b.menu_no) WHEN 'eap' THEN CONCAT((SELECT url_path FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu c WHERE c.menu_no = b.menu_no),'?menu_no=',b.menu_no) ELSE a.url_path END AS url_path, b.menu_no, b.gnb_menu_no, b.lnb_menu_no, CASE b.menu_no WHEN 0 THEN b.link_nm_kr ELSE $DB_NEOS$get_menu_first_info('1', b.menu_no, d.native_lang_Code) END AS link_nm_kr, b.link_nm_en, b.link_nm_jp, b.link_nm_cn, b.link_kind, b.msg_target, b.target_url, b.link_param, c.encrypt_type, case when b.msg_target = 'sms' then 'B' else 'C' end as messenger_view_type, case when a.event_type = 'PROJECT' then 'project' when a.event_type = 'MAIL' then 'mail2' when a.event_type = 'REPORT' then 'schedule' when a.event_type = 'EAPPROVAL' then 'eapproval' when a.event_type = 'SCHEDULE' then 'schedule' when a.event_type = 'BOARD' then 'edms' when a.event_type = 'EDMS' then 'edms' else '' end as moduleTp FROM $DB_NEOS$`t_msg_tcmh_link` a, $DB_NEOS$`t_msg_tcmg_link` b, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_encrypt` c, $DB_NEOS$`t_Co_emp` d WHERE a.token = #ssoToken# and a.link_seq = b.link_seq AND b.encrypt_seq = c.encrypt_seq and a.emp_seq = d.emp_seq LIMIT 1
isEqual.isEmpty: SELECT '1' AS ret, a.group_seq, a.comp_seq, a.emp_seq, a.link_seq, a.link_type, a.event_type, a.event_sub_type, a.url_path AS url_path, '' as menu_no, '' as gnb_menu_no, '' as lnb_menu_no, '' AS link_nm_kr, '' as link_nm_en, '' as link_nm_jp, '' as link_nm_cn, '' as link_kind, 'oneffice' as msg_target, '' as target_url, '' as link_param, '' as encrypt_type, 'C' as messenger_view_type, '' as moduleTp FROM $DB_NEOS$`t_msg_tcmh_link` a WHERE a.token = #ssoToken#

isNotEmpty.isEqual: select #sRet# as ret, tl.group_seq, tl.comp_seq, tl.emp_seq, tl.link_seq, tl.link_type, tl.event_type, tl.event_sub_type, case lower(tl.event_type) when 'mail' then (case tl.url_path when '' then (select url_path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu d where d.menu_no = cam.lnb_menu_no) else tl.url_path end) when 'schedule' then concat('/schedule', tl.url_path) when 'board' then (case when tl.event_sub_type in('BO002','BO004','BO007','BO009') then replace(concat('/home', tl.url_path),'viewPost.do', 'viewBoard.do') else (case (select cat_type from $DB_EDMS$board_category where cat_seq_no = tl.seq) when 'B' then replace(concat('/board', tl.url_path),'viewPost.do', 'viewBoard.do') else concat('/board', tl.url_path) end) end) when 'edms' then concat('/doc', tl.url_path) when 'eapproval' then if(ces.messenger_view_type='B',(select url_path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu where menu_no = cam.lnb_menu_no limit 1), tl.url_path) when 'ONEFFICE' then if(ifnull(tl.seq,'') = '', replace(tl.url_path,'/gw/','/'), replace(tl.seq,'/gw/','/')) else tl.url_path end as url_path, $DB_NEOS$get_menu_first_info('0', cam.lnb_menu_no, ce.native_lang_code) as gnb_menu_no, cam.lnb_menu_no as menu_no, CASE WHEN tl.seq is null or tl.seq = '' then cam.lnb_menu_no ELSE ( CASE lower(tl.event_type) WHEN 'schedule' then (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $DB_NEOS$t_sc_sch WHERE sch_seq=tl.seq AND gbn_code='E') > 0 THEN '301030000_my' ELSE '301040000_all' END) WHEN 'board' THEN case when tl.event_sub_type in('BO002','BO004','BO007','BO009') then '401010000' else CAST(cam.lnb_menu_no AS UNSIGNED) + CAST(tl.seq AS UNSIGNED) end WHEN 'edms' THEN CONCAT(cam.lnb_menu_no, '_', tl.seq) ELSE cam.lnb_menu_no END ) END AS lnb_menu_no, $DB_NEOS$get_menu_first_info('1', cam.lnb_menu_no, ce.native_lang_code) as link_nm_kr, '' as link_nm_en, '' as link_nm_jp, '' as link_nm_cn, 'I' as link_kind, case when tl.event_sub_type in('BO002','BO004','BO007','BO009') then 'edms' when tl.event_type = 'CUST' then '' else ifnull((select cm.url_gubun from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu cm where cm.menu_no = cam.lnb_menu_no), lower(tl.event_type)) end as msg_target, case lower(tl.event_type) when 'eapproval' then if(ces.messenger_view_type='B',(select url_path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu where menu_no = cam.lnb_menu_no limit 1), tl.url_path) else tl.url_path end as target_url, '' as link_param, '' as encrypt_type, ces.messenger_view_type, case when tl.event_type = 'PROJECT' then 'project' when tl.event_type = 'MAIL' then 'mail2' when tl.event_type = 'REPORT' then 'schedule' when tl.event_type = 'EAPPROVAL' then 'eapproval' when tl.event_type = 'SCHEDULE' then 'schedule' when tl.event_type = 'BOARD' then 'edms' when tl.event_type = 'EDMS' then 'edms' else '' end as moduleTp from $DB_NEOS$`t_msg_tcmh_link` tl, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert_menu` cam, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_event_setting` ces, $DB_NEOS$`t_Co_emp` ce where tl.token = #ssoToken# and tl.event_type = cam.event_type and tl.event_sub_type = cam.event_sub_type and tl.event_type = ces.`type` and tl.event_sub_type = ces.code and tl.emp_seq = ce.emp_seq limit 1

select #sRet# as ret, tl.group_seq, tl.comp_seq, tl.emp_seq, tl.link_seq, tl.link_type, tl.event_type, tl.event_sub_type, case lower(tl.event_type) when 'mail' then (case tl.url_path when '' then (select url_path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu d where d.menu_no = cam.lnb_menu_no) else tl.url_path end) when 'schedule' then concat('/schedule', tl.url_path) when 'board' then (case when tl.event_sub_type in('BO002','BO004','BO007','BO009') then replace(concat('/home', tl.url_path),'viewPost.do', 'viewBoard.do') else (case (select cat_type from $DB_EDMS$board_category where cat_seq_no = tl.seq) when 'B' then replace(concat('/board', tl.url_path),'viewPost.do', 'viewBoard.do') else concat('/board', tl.url_path) end) end) when 'edms' then concat('/doc', tl.url_path) when 'eapproval' then if(ces.messenger_view_type='B',(select url_path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu where menu_no = cam.lnb_menu_no limit 1), tl.url_path) when 'ONEFFICE' then if(ifnull(tl.seq,'') = '', replace(tl.url_path,'/gw/','/'), replace(tl.seq,'/gw/','/')) else tl.url_path end as url_path, $DB_NEOS$get_menu_first_info('0', cam.lnb_menu_no, ce.native_lang_code) as gnb_menu_no, cam.lnb_menu_no as menu_no, CASE WHEN tl.seq is null or tl.seq = '' then cam.lnb_menu_no ELSE ( CASE lower(tl.event_type) WHEN 'schedule' then (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $DB_NEOS$t_sc_sch WHERE sch_seq=tl.seq AND gbn_code='E') > 0 THEN '301030000_my' ELSE '301040000_all' END) WHEN 'board' THEN case when tl.event_sub_type in('BO002','BO004','BO007','BO009') then '401010000' else CAST(cam.lnb_menu_no AS UNSIGNED) + CAST(tl.seq AS UNSIGNED) end WHEN 'edms' THEN CONCAT(cam.lnb_menu_no, '_', tl.seq) ELSE cam.lnb_menu_no END ) END AS lnb_menu_no, $DB_NEOS$get_menu_first_info('1', cam.lnb_menu_no, ce.native_lang_code) as link_nm_kr, '' as link_nm_en, '' as link_nm_jp, '' as link_nm_cn, 'I' as link_kind, case when tl.event_sub_type in('BO002','BO004','BO007','BO009') then 'edms' when tl.event_type = 'CUST' then '' else ifnull((select cm.url_gubun from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu cm where cm.menu_no = cam.lnb_menu_no), lower(tl.event_type)) end as msg_target, case lower(tl.event_type) when 'eapproval' then if(ces.messenger_view_type='B',(select url_path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu where menu_no = cam.lnb_menu_no limit 1), tl.url_path) else tl.url_path end as target_url, '' as link_param, '' as encrypt_type, ces.messenger_view_type, case when tl.event_type = 'PROJECT' then 'project' when tl.event_type = 'MAIL' then 'mail2' when tl.event_type = 'REPORT' then 'schedule' when tl.event_type = 'EAPPROVAL' then 'eapproval' when tl.event_type = 'SCHEDULE' then 'schedule' when tl.event_type = 'BOARD' then 'edms' when tl.event_type = 'EDMS' then 'edms' else '' end as moduleTp from $DB_NEOS$`t_msg_tcmh_link` tl, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_alert_menu` cam, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_event_setting` ces, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_emp` ce where tl.token = #ssoToken# and tl.event_type = cam.event_type and tl.event_sub_type = cam.event_sub_type and tl.event_type = ces.`type` and tl.emp_seq = ce.emp_seq and tl.event_sub_type = ces.code limit 1

select #sRet# as ret, tl.group_seq, tl.comp_seq, tl.emp_seq, tl.link_seq, tl.link_type, tl.event_type, tl.event_sub_type, case tm.url_gubun when 'mail' then (select url_path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu d where d.menu_no = tm.gnb_menu_no) else tl.url_path end as url_path, tm.lnb_menu_no as menu_no, tm.gnb_menu_no, tm.lnb_menu_no, '' as link_nm_kr, '' as link_nm_en, '' as link_nm_jp, '' as link_nm_cn, 'I' as link_kind, tm.url_gubun as msg_target, tm.url_path as target_url, '' as link_param, '' as encrypt_type, 'C' as messenger_view_type, case when tl.event_type = 'PROJECT' then 'project' when tl.event_type = 'MAIL' then 'mail2' when tl.event_type = 'REPORT' then 'schedule' when tl.event_type = 'EAPPROVAL' then 'eapproval' when tl.event_type = 'SCHEDULE' then 'schedule' when tl.event_type = 'BOARD' then 'edms' when tl.event_type = 'EDMS' then 'edms' else '' end as moduleTp from $DB_NEOS$`t_msg_tcmh_link` tl, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_timeline_menu` tm where tl.token = #ssoToken# and tl.event_type = tm.event_type and tl.event_sub_type = tm.event_sub_type limit 1

select #sRet# as ret, tl.group_seq, tl.comp_seq, tl.emp_seq, tl.link_seq, tl.link_type, tl.event_type, tl.event_sub_type, tl.url_path, '' as menu_no, '' as gnb_menu_no, '' as lnb_menu_no, '' as link_nm_kr, '' as link_nm_en, '' as link_nm_jp, '' as link_nm_cn, 'I' as link_kind, 'mail' as msg_target, tl.url_path as target_url, '' as link_param, '' as encrypt_type, 'C' as messenger_view_type, '' as moduleTp from $DB_NEOS$`t_msg_tcmh_link` tl where tl.token = #ssoToken# limit 1

isEqual.isEmpty: select #sRet# as ret, tl.group_seq, tl.comp_seq, tl.emp_seq, tl.link_seq, tl.link_type, tl.event_type, tl.event_sub_type, case tm.url_gubun when 'mail' then (select url_path from $DB_NEOS$t_co_menu d where d.menu_no = tm.gnb_menu_no) else tl.url_path end as url_path, tm.lnb_menu_no as menu_no, tm.gnb_menu_no, tm.lnb_menu_no, $DB_NEOS$get_menu_first_info('1', tm.lnb_menu_no, ce.native_lang_code) as link_nm_kr, '' as link_nm_en, '' as link_nm_jp, '' as link_nm_cn, 'I' as link_kind, tm.url_gubun as msg_target, tm.url_path as target_url, '' as link_param, '' as encrypt_type, ces.messenger_view_type, case when tl.event_type = 'PROJECT' then 'project' when tl.event_type = 'MAIL' then 'mail2' when tl.event_type = 'REPORT' then 'schedule' when tl.event_type = 'EAPPROVAL' then 'eapproval' when tl.event_type = 'SCHEDULE' then 'schedule' when tl.event_type = 'BOARD' then 'edms' when tl.event_type = 'EDMS' then 'edms' else '' end as moduleTp from $DB_NEOS$`t_msg_tcmh_link` tl, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_timeline_menu` tm, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_event_setting` ces, $DB_NEOS$`t_co_emp` ce where tl.token = #ssoToken# and tl.event_type = tm.event_type and tl.event_sub_type = tm.event_sub_type and tl.event_type = ces.`type` and tl.event_sub_type = ces.code and tl.emp_seq = ce.emp_seq limit 1

select.isEqual: select #sRet# as ret, '' as group_seq, '' as comp_seq, '' as emp_seq, '' as link_seq, '' as link_type, '' as event_type, '' as event_sub_type, '' as url_path, '' as menu_no, '' as gnb_menu_no, '' as lnb_menu_no, '' as link_nm_kr, '' as link_nm_en, '' as link_nm_jp, '' as link_nm_cn, '' as link_kind, '' as msg_target, '' as target_url, '' as link_param, '' as encrypt_type;

sqlMap.select: select *from $DB_EDMS$board_attach_file
select cat_type from $DB_EDMS$board_category where cat_seq_no = #boardNo#

select group_seq , comp_seq , erp_seq , achr_gbn , erp_type_code , erp_name , database_type , driver , url , userid , password , create_seq , create_date , modify_seq , modify_date , erp_comp_seq , erp_comp_name , use_yn , org_sync_status , org_sync_date , g20_yn from $DB_NEOS$t_co_erp where comp_seq = #compSeq# and achr_gbn = #achrGbn#
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP()
SELECT (SELECT ifnull(wehago_key,'') FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp WHERE comp_seq = #compSeq#) cno, (SELECT ifnull(wehago_id,'') FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp WHERE emp_seq = #empSeq#) wehago_id
